## EF934-240662-2 – Inspection Services for Pressure Vessel Devices

### Solicitation Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWPSC) invites tenders for the annual and/or biannual safety inspections of boiler equipment, pressure vessels, and piping systems at Crown-owned facilities located in Quebec and facilities governed by federal laws.

### Solicitation Details

* Reference number: WS4359113091-Doc4477884706
* Amendment number: 2
* Publication date: 2024-03-07
* Tender closing date and time: 2024-03-20, 14:00 EST
* Amendment date: 2024-03-18
* Expected contract start date: N/A
* Expected contract end date: February 1, 2025

### Service Description

This Request for Proposal encompasses the inspection of safety devices attached to operational boilers, pressure vessels, and pressure piping systems. Inspection services will be conducted at facilities across Quebec and buildings governed by federal laws. The notice can be found at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19018795?extsite=MTkwMTg3OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

### Evaluation Criteria

Bidders will be evaluated based on the combination of the highest-possible technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to consortiums and bidders who are part of the following trade agreements:
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact Andy Doucette:
